Text: You are deep inside the forest at an unknown location.
You are somewhere deep inside the forest.
You are deep inside the forest, your exact whereabouts unknown.
You are deep inside the forest, although you're unsure of exactly where.
You are deep inside the forest, although the dense, repetitive foliage makes it hard to work out where.
The occasional sunlight trickling down the forest canopy helps to illuminate your surroundings.
The forest landscape could be considered serene -- if you weren't currently lost in it.
You can hear birds chirping, although you cannot deduce where the sound is coming from.
The occasional moonlight trickling down the forest canopy helps to illuminate your surroundings.
The forest landscape could be considered serene -- if you weren't currently lost in it.
You can hear the orchestra of a forest at night, which at least gives you something to listen to while attempting to find your way.

Entries.__Comment: The difference between the normal lines and the ring ones is that the ring ones don't mention you being lost -- you have a guide, after all.
Text: The occasional sunlight trickling down the forest canopy helps to illuminate your surroundings.
The serene forest landscape surrounds you.
You can hear birds chirping, although you cannot deduce where the sound is coming from.

Entries.__Comment: One of these days I'm going to typo this 'DEEPFROST', I can feel it.
Text: The occasional moonlight trickling down the forest canopy helps to illuminate your surroundings.
The serene forest landscape surrounds you.
You can hear the orchestra of a forest at night.
The forest is sparse enough here that you can {?|go|move} in any direction.
The forest opens up a little here, allowing you to {?|go|move} in any direction.
You're currently in a small clearing, with all directions available to you.
You can try going {!directions or}.
{!directions and caps} look like suitable directions to move in.
It {?|looks like|appears} you can go {!directions or}.
You've reached a dead-end, with {!direction} being the only available direction.
The forest becomes much denser here -- {!direction} is the only way you can {?|go|move}.
You can only {?|go|move} {!direction}.
{!direction caps} is the only direction available to you.
It {?|looks like|appears that} you can only {?|go|move} {!direction}.

Entries.__Comment: If I have to type DEEPFOREST one more time I swear I'm gonna turn Finmer into a CTM map where you're gonna have to navigate through the 'DEEPFROST STRONGHOLD' to assemble the lost multicolor amber monolith. I'm sure Rux would be somewhat concerned.
Text: You can feel a beckoning towards the {!direction}.
The ring tries to guide you {!direction}.
Your mind is drawn towards the {!direction}.
